description:
Nobunaga and his main forces are able to get through Kutsukidani safely after Matsunaga convinces Kutsuki to side with them. However, Hideyoshi’s rearguard forces were being pushed to their final limits. Hanbee tells them that they could successfully get away at this point, but what does Hideyoshi decide to do?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ie ni Kaeru made ga Shingari Desu
L’arrière-garde le reste tant qu’elle n’est pas rentrée
We`re the Rearguard Until We Get Home
家に帰るまでが殿[しんがり]です
